font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } .header-logo { display: none; } .toolbar-content ion-title>div { opacity: 0; } .toolbar-content:before { width: 50%; content: ""; background-image: url(https://apphopewell.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/hopewellheader.png); height: 50px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center bottom; background-size:contain; z-index: -1; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 10px; margin: auto; color: white; height: 35px; content: ''!important; background-size: contain; /* bottom: 3vh; */ background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; background-position: center; /* vertical-align: middle; */ /* left: 10vw; */ /* position: absolute; */ z-index: -1; } ion-title{ display:none; } *{ border:none!important; } .ion-page ion-content, .ion-page ion-list .item { color: ; background-color: ; margin-top: -18vh; height: 118vh; } .toolbar-background, .toolbar-background-ios, .tabs .tabbar, .tabs-ios .tabbar, .custom-page .menu-card { background: transparent; } .menu-inner{ width:100%; } .menu-inner .content{ background: none; background-size:cover; background-position:center; } ion-content{ background: #040c1d; } .menu-inner ion-list .item{ background:none; border:none; left:2vw; text-transform:uppercase; font-family: 'AvenirLT-Black'; } .menu-inner ion-list button.activated .label{ color:#d3352c; } .menu-inner ion-list .item:nth-child(1){ margin-top:22vh; } .back-button .back-button-text { display: none!important; } ion-list.list{ margin-top:12vh; } ion-header{ background:rgba(300,300,300,.5); box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.1); } ion-avatar, p.loggedin-msg { display: none; } .menu-inner .content { background:url(https://nmasonapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Menubg.jpg); background-size: cover; background-position: center; } ion-title{ text-align:center; text-transform: uppercase; font-family: 'GothamBlack'; } .toolbar-background{ border-color:transparent; } .toolbar-content, .toolbar-title, .bar-button-default, .toolbar .bar-button-default:hover, .toolbar .segment-button, .toolbar button.activated, .tabs .tab-button .tab-button-icon, .tab-button .tab-button-text, .tabbar .tab-button[aria-selected=true] .tab-button-icon, ion-toolbar .button, .toolbar input.searchbar-input { color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); } .label { text-align: center; font-family: 'AvenirNextCondensed-Bold'; font-size: 20px; letter-spacing:2px; } ion-list.list { margin-top: 0vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .menu-inner ion-list .item { display: block; margin: 0 auto; } .menu-inner ion-list ion-icon { color:#d3352c; position: absolute; font-size: 25px; left:68px; top:4px; } .show-menu .menu-inner > ion-header{ display:none; } .bar-button .button-inner .ion-md-share{ display:none; } .menu-inner ion-list .item, .menu-inner ion-list > .item:last-child, .menu-inner ion-list > .item-wrapper:last-child .item { border-bottom: none; } ion-list button{ border-bottom:none; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none; } .menu-inner ion-list .item-block .item-inner { margin-left: 0px; } .toolbar-content:before{ display:none; } .header, .header-md:after{ background:none; box-shadow:none; } .menu-inner .list-md:before{ background-image: url(https://nmasonapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/nicole-logo2.png); width:100%; height: 70px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center bottom; background-size:contain; z-index: -1; position: absolute; top:30px; left: 0; right: 0; margin: auto; color: white; content: ''!important; background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; background-position: center; z-index: -1; } /************************/ /************************/ /************************/
